/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity with several cars and buses in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, a bus stop can be seen, hinting at the daily commute of the city's inhabitants. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
